Developers

Overview

This CEMEX Design Language CSS Styleguide can be installed as a bundle or as separate CSS files to stylize HTML5 websites or components (Angular, React).

Developers can clone the components example repository to find examples on how to apply the DLS styles into existing components. Reference components can also be found in the package, they can be used as reference or be extended.

Developers are also welcome to contribute with features or fixes by opening a pull request.

Installation

Plain CSS: Download a distribution package from the DSL Styleguide repository

Angular: Clone the components example repository for Angular

React: Clone the components example repository for React

Installation

CSS Styleguide and distribution 
# Note: In this example you are cloning into ~/dev/dls and your project is in ~/dev/my-project.
                        git clone https://bitbucket.org/cemex/dlsdraft.git ~/dev/dls
cp -r ~/dev/dls/dist ~/dev/my-project/css
rem Note: In this example you are cloning into c:\dev\dls and your project is in c:\dev\my-project.
                        git clone https://bitbucket.org/cemex/dlsdraft.git c:\dev\dls
xcopy /e c:\dev\dls\dist c:\dev\my-project
Angular reference components 
git clone https://bitbucket.org/cx-dls/cx-quickstart-angular.git --branch development
cd cx-quickstart-angular
npm install
npm start
git clone https://bitbucket.org/cx-dls/cx-quickstart-angular.git --branch development
cd cx-quickstart-angular
npm install
npm start

Code examples

The following section demonstrates the DSL Framework CSS Styleguide and provides reference code for different technologies.

Buttons

Button    The most basic button 
<!-- In HTML, just include the cmx-button class. --><a class="cmx-button">Button</a>
// In Angular, use ´button.component.css´ or extend the reference component.<cx-button title="Button"></cx-button>
Button    An outlined button 
<!-- use the `cmx-button--support` class --><a class="cmx-button cmx-button--support">Outlined</a>
// Use the `outlined` attribute<cx-button outlined="outlined" title="Outlined"></cx-button>
Pay    Manage    Text links, small and medium sized. 
<!-- use the `cmx-button--link` classes: --><a class="cmx-button cmx-button--link cmx-button--link-small" href="#">Pay</a>
<a class="cmx- cmx-button--link cmx-button--link-medium" href="#">Manage</a>
// Use the `display="link"` attribute<cx-button display="link" title="Pay" size="small"></cx-button>
<cx-button display="link" title="Manage" size="medium"></cx-button>
Pay WITH ICON   Colored buttons and icons. See colors and icons sections. 
<!-- You can set icons and colors with the following classes: --><a class="button button--primary" href="#">Pay</a>
<a class="button icon-magnifier-glass" href="#">With icon</a>
// Use the `display="link"` attribute<cx-button type="confirmed" title="Pay"></cx-button>
<cx-button icon="magnifier-glass" title="with icon"></cx-button>
Not available Not available   Buttons and other controls can be disabled. 
<!-- Use the `disabled` class: --><a class="button disabled" href="#">Not available</a>
<a class="button--support disabled" href="#">Not available</a>
// Use `disabled` attribute<cx-button disabled="disabled" title="Not available"></cx-button>
<cx-button outlined="outlined" disabled="disabled" title="Not available"></cx-button>

Form controls


A basic text input field. 
<!-- HTML --><div class="form-group">
  <label for="name-field">Name</label>
  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="name-field" placeholder="Enter name" name="" value="" />
</div>
// Angular reference component<cx-text label="Name" placeholder="Enter a name"></cx-text>
Error message displayed here.

A text input field displaying a validation error. 
<!-- HTML --><div class="form-group error">
  <label for="name-field">Name</label>
  <input type="text" class="form-control" id="name-field" placeholder="Enter name" name="" value="" />
  <span class="error-message">Error message displayed here.</span>
</div>
// Angular reference component<cx-text error="Error message displayed here." label="Name" placeholder="Enter a name"></cx-text>

A text area component. 
<!-- HTML --><div class="form-group">
<label for="textarea-field">Comments</label>
<textarea id="textarea-field" placeholder="Enter your comments" class="form-control"></textarea>
</div>
// Angular reference component<cx-textarea label="Comments" placeholder="Enter your comments"></cx-textarea>
A select component. 
<!-- HTML --><div class="form-group">                                          
<label for="my-field">Numbers</label>
<select id="my-field" class="form-control">
    <option>One</option>
    <option>Two</option>
    <option>Three</option>
</select>
</div>
// Angular reference component<cx-select [model]="['One', 'Two', 'Tree']" label="Numbers"></cx-select>
Alabama
Alaska
Arizona
Arkansas
California
Colorado
Connecticut

An expanded dropdown component. 
<div class="select-dd">
    <div class="select-dd__options">
        <div class="select-dd__option">Alabama</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">Alaska</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">Arizona</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">Alabama</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">Arkansas</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">California</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">Colorado</div>
        <div class="select-dd__option">Connecticut</div>
    </div>
</div>
// Angular reference component<cx-select dropdown [model]="['Alabama', 'Alaska', 'Arizona', 'Arkansas', 'California', 'Colorado', 'Connecticut']" label="States"></cx-select>

Checkboxes and radio buttons. 
<!-- HTML --><div class="form-field">
    <input type="checkbox" id="checkbox" checked="checked" />
    <label for="checkbox">
        <span>Checked checkbox</span>
    </label>
</div>
<div class="form-field">
    <input type="radio" id="radio" name="options" checked="checked" />
    <label for="radio">
        <span>Radio option 1</span>
    </label>
</div>
// Angular reference component<cx-check label="Checkbox"></cx-check>
<cx-radio name="radio" [model]="[
    {
        label: 'Option 1',
        value: 1
    }
]"></cx-radio>
